translations.translation: And We left his (memory) for posterity.
We preserved a good name for him among posterity.
We perpetuated his praise in the later generations.
And We kept his praise among the latter generations.
And We left for him among the later generations.
And We perpetuated to him (praise) among the later generations.
and We left for him among the later folk
And we left for him among the later folk (the salutation):
We left him thus to be succeeded by a group [of followers] among the following generations --
And We left for him among the posterity:
We left for him a good name in posterity.
And We left (this blessing) for him among generations (to come) in later times:
And We left for him (a goodly remembrance) among generations (to come) in later times;
And We let it (the beautiful praise) remain upon him in the latter (generations),
And We left with him for later generations.
And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
[37:129] and We left for him among posterity, fair praise [namely]:
(And we left for him among the later folk (the salutation)) We left for Elias good praise among the people who came after him:

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ } أي: على إلياس أيضاً ذكراً جميلاً { فِي ٱلآخِرِينَ } [الصافات: 129] حيث يقولون حين ثنائهم عليه وتكريمهم أياه: { سَلاَمٌ عَلَىٰ إِلْ يَاسِينَ } [الصافات: 130] وهو لغة في إلياس؛ كجبريل في جبرائيل، وسينين في سيناء




{ إِنَّا كَذَلِكَ نَجْزِي ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ } [الصافات: 131] المستحفظين عل أحكامنا ومقتضيات أوامرنا ونواهينا




وكيف لا نجزيه أحسن الجزاء؟! { إِنَّهُ مِنْ } جملة { عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ } [الصافات: 132] المتكنين في مقر التوحيد واليقين، الفائزين بمقام الكشف والشهود
